class main.Main¶

The Main class initiates the user and listens for data from the client pi

ADDRESS = None¶

Identifies Host name and port to use

listener()¶

Listens for data sent through sockets from the client pi

name = None¶

Identifies Users Name

user = None¶

Identifies User
